meanings.sent1: The reechy garbage bin made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent2: The reechy socks needed to be washed immediately.
meanings.sent3: The reechy cheese was so stinky, it could walk itself to the trash.
meanings.sent4: The reechy odor hung in the air like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The reechy smell was so overpowering, it made my eyes water.

meanings.definition: Covered in a layer of soot or grime.
meanings.sent1: The reechy fireplace left black marks on the walls.
meanings.sent2: The reechy car needed a good wash to remove the dirt.
meanings.sent3: The reechy hands of the mechanic showed he had been working hard.
meanings.sent4: The reechy streets of the old town whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The reechy chimney belched out smoke, leaving everything dark and dirty.
